table.aspect_a_0: your pride and respect for yourself
table.aspect_b_3: your sense of security about life and the future in general
table.aspect_b_4: the amount of order and stability in your life
table.aspect_b_6: your chance to live a long life
table.aspect_b_10: the amount of pleasure in your life
table.aspect_b_11: the absence of shame and guilt in your life
table.aspect_c_0: your physical safety and security, and your sense of security about life and the future in general
table.aspect_c_1: your physical safety and security, and the amount of order and stability in your life
table.aspect_c_2: your physical safety and security, and your physical comfort
table.aspect_c_3: your physical safety and security, and your chance to live a long life
table.aspect_c_4: your physical safety and security, and how happy you feel
table.aspect_c_5: your physical safety and security, and your material standard of living
table.aspect_c_6: your physical safety and security, and your financial security
table.aspect_c_7: your physical safety and security, and the amount of pleasure in your life
table.aspect_c_8: your physical safety and security, and the absence of shame and guilt in your life
table.aspect_c_9: your physical safety and security, and your sense of purpose

queue.body:
Consent

Please consider this information carefully before deciding whether to participate in this research.

Purpose of the research:

We are a group of scientists, affiliated with Cornell University and the University of Michigan, gathering data to develop an index of subjective well-being. If you have any questions about the research or your participation in this study, feel free to contact us: Professors Daniel Benjamin, Ori Heffetz, Miles Kimball

What we will ask you about:

We will ask you a series of questions, first about the level of various aspects of your well-being and then about the relative importance of each of these aspects in your life.

Risks:

No risks are anticipated.

Confidentiality:

All research data will be collected anonymously and we will not store any personally-identifiable information. Your responses will be collected over an encrypted SSL connection, the same level of security that protects your username and password when you sign on to Gmail or Amazon.com.

Participation and withdrawal:

Your participation in this study is completely voluntary. At any time you may choose to terminate your survey sesssion and we will not store your survey responses.
queue.agree: I have read the above disclosure and agree to participate in this study
